title: Booki
description:
Complete integration of a property rental site based on a Figma model.
Pixel-perfect integration, responsive for phone and tablet, and compliance with the client's specifications.

title: Sophie Bluel - Architecte d'intérieur
description:
Front-end integration of native JavaScript from a static site.
Creation of a filter system for the gallery, an authentication system and modals for adding and deleting items.

title: Nina Carducci - Photographe
description:
Optimised performance, in particular through image management.
Debugging of existing Jqery code.
Improved referencing by implementing good SEO practices.

title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
description:
Development from scratch of the back end of a book rating website.implementation of a REST API (CRUD) in compliance with a view-controller model architecture.
User authentication management.
Emphasis on security using third-party libraries such as Mongoose or Brute.js.

title: Kasa
description:
Development and integration of the Front-End of an ‘AirBnB’-style property rental website.
Use of React.js and hooks as well as Sass for the Css.
Creation of Css animations.Deployment using React best practices.
